Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oTo appear in GLOBECOM 2021. This paper focuses on the multi-IRS placement optimization and downlink AP power control for achieving max-min throughput in asingle-cell multi-user system. A ring-based IRS placement scheme
is proposed which utilizes the near-AP/near-user deployment modes. Closed-form power control policy is devised to equalize the users' non-outage probability\u00a7r
